cards.name: Smallfolk Mob
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Sacrifice a unique [stark] character to put Smallfolk Mob into play from shadows.

cards.name: Shadow of the North
cards.text: Shadow (1). Play only during a challenge. Action: Raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. If there is a Winter plot card revealed, return Shadow of the North to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Highgarden Jester
cards.text: Insight. Forced Reaction: After Highgarden Jester draws a card using insight, place a random card from your hand on top of your deck. (Choose a card from your hand and place it on top of your deck instead if there is another Fool character in play.)

cards.name: Shadow of the Rose
cards.text: Shadow (2). Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a card with shadow, reveal it, and put it into shadows. Shuffle your deck. If there is a Summer plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Rose to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Yoren
cards.text: Reaction: After Yoren enters play, choose a character with printed cost 5 or lower. Take control of that character until Yoren leaves play.
cards.flavor: "Do what you want to the town, it's naught to me, but leave us be. We're no foes to you."

cards.name: Bound for the Wall
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, reveal the top 5 cards of the losing opponent's deck. You may put a character revealed this way into play under your control. Place the other revealed cards on the bottom of that player's deck in a random order. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Ser Preston Greenfield
cards.text: Shadow (4). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Preston Greenfield is participating, the losing opponent must move 1 power from his or her faction card to a standing character he or she controls.

cards.name: Blackwater Rush
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, kneel Blackwater Rush to choose a [baratheon] character. That character gains 1 power.

cards.name: Tyrion Lannister
cards.text: Shadow (5). Insight. Reaction: After a non-event card you control comes out of shadows, place another card you control in shadows with a shadow token on it. While that card is in shadows, it gains shadow (X). X is its printed cost. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: A Very Large Shadow
cards.text: Shadow (0). Action: Reduce the cost of the next card you bring out of shadows this phase by 3. If there is a Scheme plot card revealed, return A Very Large Shadow to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: Maester Kerwin
cards.text: Interrupt: When another character would be killed, kill Maester Kerwin to save that character.
cards.flavor: Maesters had their uses, but Victarion had nothing but contempt for this Kerwin. With his smooth pink cheeks, soft hands, and brown curls, he looked more girlish that most girls.

cards.name: "The Bloody Cup"
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent and place it on top of its owner's deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Covert Loyalist
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Discard a [targaryen] card with printed cost 4 or higher from your hand to put Covert Loyalist into play from shadows.

cards.name: Music of Dragons
cards.text: Challenges Action: Search your deck for a Dragon character, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavor: ...for the first time in hundreds of years, the night came alive with the music of dragons.

cards.name: Dagos Manwoody
cards.text: While there are 5 or more different Traits among plot cards in your used pile, Dagos Manwoody gains renown and stealth.

cards.name: The Mountain's Skull
cards.text: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown. Reaction: After an opponent's character with printed STR 6 or higher is killed, put The Mountain's Skull into play from your hand or discard pile.

cards.name: Sparrows
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Sparrows comes out of shadows, move 1 power from an opponent's faction card to another The Seven card you control.

cards.name: White Cloak
cards.text: Knight character you control only. Attached character gains the Kingsguard trait. Interrupt: When a King or Queen character would be killed, kneel attached character to save it.

cards.name: The White Book
cards.text: You may include non-loyal Kingsguard characters from any faction in your deck. You must include at least 7 different Kingsguard characters in your deck. Reaction: After you win a challenge, kneel your faction card to stand each defending Kingsguard character you control. (Each participating Kingsguard character you control instead if you control a King or Queen character.)

cards.name: King's Landing Riot
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if there are 3 or more City plot cards in your used pile, discard each character from play.
